main event: An unknown metallic object was observed over Hillsboro Airport in Oregon on June 4th, 1949. The object appeared to wobble slightly, remained in a fixed position for about 3 minutes, and then rapidly moved in a Southwesterly direction.
interesting points: The object was described as metallic in color, rather large and round in shape, comparable to the size of an object 3/8 inch in diameter held at arm's length.
There was no sound or exhaust trail associated with the object.
The observers emphasized that due to the reflection of light, it was difficult for them to accurately determine the size or shape of the object.
The object was seen through binoculars and was evident for several minutes or longer.
The report was initiated by the Acting District Commander after being advised of the unknown object sighted over Hillsboro Airport.
